mapper.update: update ate set code = #{code}, num = #{num},date = #{date} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select sum(food.CODE) code, food.NAME, sum(food.SUPPORTPEREAT *ate.num) supportpereat, sum(food.CALORY * ate.num) calory, sum(food.CARBO * ate.num) carbo, sum(food.PROTEIN * ate.num) protein, sum(food.fat * ate.num) fat, sum(food.sugar * ate.num) sugar, sum(food.NATRUIM * ate.num) natrium, sum(food.chole * ate.num) chole, sum(food.FATTYACID * ate.num) fattyacid, sum(food.TRANSFAT * ate.num) transfat, food.MAKER, food.MATERIAL, food.IMG, food.ALLERGY, food.count from food, ate where food.code = ate.code and ate.id=#{userid} group by ate.date having ate.date = curdate();
